tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Alka Gupta is the Panacea for our family with regard to treatment of my mother and my Bhabhi(Ladies in our Family).  Dr. Alka Gupta treated my mother and my Bhabhi by following the highest medical benchmarks as per the medical jurisprudence and many a times she has taken quick decisions which really has saved the ladies of our family from facing untoward situations.  

When my Bhabhi was in her mother‚Äôs way and was under regular supervision and treatment of Dr Alka, and was regularly visiting her as prescribed by Dr Alka Gupta, on one particular visit in evening, as usual she has undertaken the necessary medical examinations done and on the basis of the report, she took the quick decision of operation, on the same day late in evening and due to quick most appropriate decision being taken by Dr . Alka Gupta, we got the GIFT of almighty, in form of baby boy, my nephew, this kind of instances many a times in my family with regard to the treatment of ladies has always proved that she being the Best Gynaecologist and a best Lady Doctor, who is a quick decision maker in a given medical situation. 

The all ladies in my family being the large family are safe and healthy in due care, Supervision and guidance of Dr. Alka Gupta. Even in most critical medical situations, Dr. Alka Gupta will maintain her coolness and remain with her ease, which makes the patient and the attendant really comfortable. 

Dr. Alka always remains calm, composed and carrying a pleasant smile on her face howsoever the critical the medical situation may be .The ladies of our family are blessed to be under the treatment of *** **** gynaecologist who has always treated them with ease and affection. That for any and every problem of the ladies in my family the one and only Doctor i.e. Dr.Alka Gupta, in whom we repose great confidence and trust. 

Our ladies in my family are really fortunate to remain under the medical supervision and care of Dr. Alka Gupta who is our Family Doctor for ladies since last 10 years. 

Doc sab, our all prayers for your happy and healthy life and may almighty always keep you happy and healthy.üôè
reply_text: Thanks Mr Parashar, for these lovely words. Pray the same for u and your family- health and happiness

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Infertility And Pcod,Endometriosis Treatment,Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Endometriosis,
review:
Dr Alka Gupta changed my opinion about Gynaecologists. *** ** ************** ** *********** *** **** ** ********* *** ********** She gives minimal medicines and decides what to give based on how you want to be treated. 
What mattered was the way she dealt with my fears as a patient.
She talks to you like a concerned parent who will shoulder your fears. She did not consider even a single question of mine as silly and answered each one of them. She guided me on what to expect from the treatment. And even answered my doubts on WhatsApp whenever I sent them.

Be assured that Dr. Gupta will make you feel supported, answer your queries, and make you feel in control of your treatment. 

It is emotionally draining to have long standing fertility / PCOS / Endometriosis issues, so this emotional support that she gives comes as a blessing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Alka, is an extremely polite and compassionate doctor. I have consulted her for my mom‚Äôs UTI and she very patiently heard me and asked me for relevant details of my mother. I am happy that she did not recommend me a ton of medicines but just gave her the necessary medicine understanding the fact that my mum has just been out of the hospital and had a heavy dose of medication. Thank you doctor Alka, there is such a positive vibe in her that gives instant comfort feeling! Stay blessed and stay safe.
reply_text: Thanks, for the kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Alka Gupta is a very humble doctor. My association with her has been for over years. *** ** ** ********* ****** * extremely caring and kind. *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * ***** She makes sure the patient is comfortable always. She explains everything very clearly. I owe my son‚Äôs life to her. My pregnancy was very complicated and she handled it with utmost care and patience. She has been my daughter‚Äôs gynaecologist since past 4 years and has been treating her for PCOS. Under her guidance my daughter is getting better day by day. She has been a constant support and is always just a call away. I have never needed to visit any other doctor after visiting her. All i can say is thank you so much from the core of my heart.
reply_text: Thanks Meetu, for such kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I was highly diabetic when I conceived which made my pregnancy high risk. I went to Dr Alka, disappointed after visiting two gynae, who indirectly suggested me to give up this time and try conceiving again after controlling my sugar levels. But Dr Alka did not agree with this. She councelled, supported and boosted me and believed that my baby deserved at least one hard try. Her concerns for me and the baby were always so high that I never felt I was visiting a doc but a family. Our efforts did work out. With her constant positive attitude & up-to-date knowledge & treatment I successfully delivered a baby boy. Even the clinic is well managed and clean. The staff is also helpful and prompt. I would definitely recommend her for all mothers-to-be, specially first timers.
reply_text: Thank u Charu, for such wonderful words. I would give lots of credit to u , for religiously following the counselling and treatment. It was a pleasure for me also to treat u . We finally achieved God‚Äôs blessings

I have been with doctor Alka Gupta since 2002. I strongly recommend her as a competent and highly experienced gynaecologist,who is also aware about the latest scientific  research in her field.of.practice. 

She is sensitive to the patient's physical and emotional condition and is fully committed to her practice.

review: Dr Alka Gupta is an amazing doctor. She is very methodical and understands the complete back ground of the patient and listens very patiently. Me and my wife were very happy with the simplicity with which she explained the issues and the next diagnosis steps. She is really approachable and it is rare to find such doctors who bring that much needed touch of  empathy which relaxes and assures a patient. Thanks a lot mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have known Dr. Alka Gupta for more than a decade. Both my pregnancies which were very critical were managed by her very swiftly. With the treatment she gives personal touch which makes even tough time seem very comfortable. Her follow up after the treatment is amazing. She is available any time, if she is not able to pick the call. She ensures she calls back. I strongly recommend her for all critical cases.
